objects.query: SELECT Id, Name, Description, Family, IsActive FROM Product2
SELECT Id, Name, Description, IsActive FROM Pricebook2
SELECT IsActive, Pricebook2Id, UnitPrice, Product2Id FROM PricebookEntry

SELECT Name,hed__Active__c,hed__Asynchronous__c,hed__Class__c,hed__Filter_Field__c,hed__Filter_Value__c,hed__Load_Order__c,hed__Object__c,hed__Owned_by_Namespace__c,hed__Trigger_Action__c,hed__User_Managed__c,hed__Usernames_to_Exclude__c FROM hed__Trigger_Handler__c
SELECT BuyerGroupId,WebStoreId FROM WebStoreBuyerGroup
SELECT Name,Id FROM WebStore
SELECT Id, Name from ProductCatalog
SELECT Id, CatalogId, Description, Name, ParentCategoryId, IsNavigational, SortOrder from ProductCategory
SELECT Id, Name, New_Idea_To_Email_Address__c FROM Flow_Automation_Settings__c
SELECT Name,Internal_Url__c,External_Url__c FROM Idea_Form_Url_Setting__c
Select Id, DeveloperName, SObjectType From RecordType Where SObjectType IN ('Account','hed__Course__c','hed__Course_Enrollment__c','Product_Request__c','Product_Specification__c')
SELECT Id,Name, IsPartner,IsCustomerPortal,AccountSource,IsBuyer, RecordTypeId, Organization_Unit_Level__c from Account

SELECT Id,Name,AccountId,LastName,FirstName,hed__Chosen_Full_Name__c,Salutation,Email,QUT_Staff_Email__c,QUT_Employee_Id__c,QUT_Identity_Id__c,QUT_Student_ID__c,Birthdate,Migration_Key__c,Description from Contact
SELECT Id, Name, BuyerId, BuyerStatus, IsActive, CommerceType, Buyer.Name from BuyerAccount
SELECT Id, RecordTypeId, Name, Client_Review_Required__c, IsExternal_Requestor__c, Requestor_Internal_External__c, Requestor_Name__c, Stage__c, Status__c FROM Product_Specification__c

SELECT Id, RecordTypeId, Name, Create_Offering_Complete__c, Create_Product_Complete__c, Is_Curriculum_Approved__c, Product_Request_Status__c, Product_Specification__c, Program_Structure_Complete__c FROM Product_Request__c
SELECT Id, Name, hed__Account__c FROM hed__Term__c

SELECT Id, Name, RecordTypeId, Recordtype_Name__c, IsComplete__c, Is_Curriculum_Approved__c, Mark_Content_as_Complete__c, Mark_Design_Stage_as_Complete__c, OPE_Design_Complete__c, ProductRequestID__c, hed__Account__c FROM hed__Course__c

SELECT Id, Name, Delivery_Type__c, IsActive__c, Registration_End_Date__c, Registration_Start_Date__c, Total_Course_Connections__c, Visible_on_Website__c, hed__Course__c, hed__End_Date__c, hed__Start_Date__c, hed__Term__c FROM hed__Course_Offering__c

SELECT Id, RecordTypeId, Recordtype_Name__c, Name, Amount__c, IsActive__c, LMS_Integration_Status__c, Paid_in_Full__c, Payment_Method__c, Transaction_ID__c, hed__Contact__c, hed__Course_Offering__c, hed__Primary__c, hed__Status__c FROM hed__Course_Enrollment__c
SELECT Id, Name, Object_Type__c, Parent_Record_ID__c, Questionnaire_Type__c FROM Questionnaire__c
SELECT Id, Name, Label__c, Type__c FROM Question__c
SELECT Id, Name, Application_Status__c, Contact__c, Course_Offering__c, Questionnaire__c, Registration_Status__c FROM Questionnaire_Response_Summary__c
SELECT Id, Name, Question__c, Questionnaire__c, Sequence__c FROM Related_Answer__c
SELECT Id, Name, Questionnaire_Response_Summary__c, Related_Answer__c, Response__c, Sequence__c FROM Answer__c
Select Id, Name, Description, CanViewProduct, CanViewPrice, IsActive from CommerceEntitlementPolicy
SELECT Name,Id,Description FROM BuyerGroup
SELECT BuyerGroupId,PolicyId from CommerceEntitlementBuyerGroup
SELECT Id, BuyerId,BuyerGroupId from BuyerGroupMember
SELECT Id,BuyerGroupId,Name,IsActive,Pricebook2Id,Priority,BuyerGroup.Id,Pricebook2.Name from BuyerGroupPricebook
SELECT Id,BuyerGroupId,PolicyId,BuyerGroup.Id,Policy.Name from CommerceEntitlementBuyerGroup
